name: Semisolidarity [VR]
description:
Buddy up with an experimental blob, solve puzzles, and break out of the lab. 

Use gestural movements in VR to control the blob to pick up keys and bring them back to yourself to unlock doors and solve other puzzles. 

Only tested with with INDEX controllers, but other major VR hardware should be supported. 

Trigger picks up the blob, you can also throw him. 

Action button 1 gives you a movement UI for the blob, hold it and move your hand laterally to move the blob around. You can also hold it and gesture up to make him float for short time and gesture down to flatten him to get under doors.

Action button 2 gives you a movement UI, hold it and move your hand laterally to move yourself. 

FYI: On Vive wands, we decided to go with the menu button and grip for the two action buttons.

Only the right hand buttons work for the Stay Safe Jam build. Left hand is purely for aesthetics.

Hand model is from another project, but all animations/poses were made for jam
Hires Scifi Prop Pack by Jonathan Fredrick was used for filler assets
Sounds are from Soundly

All other assets, blueprints, mechanics, logic, animations, morph targets, models, textures, materials, and environment assets were made during the 48 hrs of the Stay Safe Jam.

Made by Beefeastwood and Metagrafox in 48 hrs.
